name: Mexican Tomato-Flavored Rice
author: Luis-Christine Poncio
summary: This recipe makes nice fluffy rice every time with great taste. It was given to me by my grandmother!
ingredients: 1 ½ tablespoons tomato-flavored bouillon powder (such as Knorr®)
directions: Heat oil in a saucepan over medium heat
Fry rice in hot oil until golden brown, 2 to 3 minutes
Stream water into the saucepan while stirring the rice; season with tomato powder, onion powder, and garlic powder and stir
Bring the mixture to a boil and cook at a boil for 2 minutes
Reduce heat to low, place a cover on the saucepan, and cook until the moisture is mostly absorbed by the rice, about 15 minutes
Remove saucepan from heat and let sit covered to let last moisture be absorbed into rice, about 5 minutes more
